system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: The user may freely move up to double their Flight Score when declaring this attack. On hit, all legal targets gain @Affliction[paralysis] 5.

Requirement: [Pikachu] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Thunderbolt on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Stoked Sparksurfer

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
